name: Machine Gun Turret
description: Attach this to the roof slot of your vehicle to fire machine gun rounds similar to a Minigun.

name: Grenade Launcher Turret
description: Also attachable to the roof slot, it fires grenades and deals explosive damage.

name: Spiked Bumper
description: Attach this to the front bumper slot to deal more damage to players and objects on impact.

name: Cow Catcher
description: Boost your ramming power and give your car some defensive armor by attaching this to the front bumper slot.

name: Bulletproof Tires
description: Attach these to the tires slot to make your tires indestructible.

name: Chonkers Off-Road Tires
description: These tires enhance off-road performance for your vehicle.
